parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate by name, surname, or any other clear identifier.  It mentions RMDSZ (Uniunea Democrată Maghiară din România), but this is a party, not a specific candidate. The post promotes a service offered by Eurotrans Foundation, not a candidate.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its message is clearly intended to reach a wide audience in Hunedoara County, promoting the services of Eurotrans Foundation.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to inform the public about the availability of services offered by Eurotrans Foundation in various locations. There is no explicit or implicit attempt to influence voters' choices in the parliamentary elections.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of public service announcement, informing citizens about access to services. It does not contain opinions or analysis intended to sway votes.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express personal opinions.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2775061332672921</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes the services of Eurotrans Foundation, providing information about their outreach program in Hunedoara County.  While the RMDSZ logo is present, the post itself does not advocate for any specific candidate or party in the parliamentary elections. The content focuses solely on informing the public about the availability of services, not influencing their electoral choices. The presence of the RMDSZ logo alone is insufficient to classify this as electoral propaganda, especially considering the lack of any direct or indirect endorsement of a candidate.  The post does not meet the criteria of Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, as it lacks an electoral objective and does not exceed the limits of informative communication.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Eurotrans Alapítvány</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
